record.description: One hundred fifty guests attended the dedication of the new three million-volume Midwest Inter-Library Center. Ralph T. Esterquest (left) center director, and Mark Ingraham, center vice-chairman and University of Wisconsin dean, watch as William T. Middlebrook, University of Minnesota vice-president and library corporation chairman cuts the ribbon at the building's entrance.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Stamp: Please return to the University of Chicago Office of Press Relations.
